summary: This is a brief internal email from September 2021 discussing Victim Specialists (VS) who have assisted victims in the Epstein/Maxwell case. The sender has compiled a list and is coordinating with a recipient on how to request further information from these specialists and identify others.
keyFacts: The document is an internal email dated September 10, 2021, concerning the Epstein/Maxwell case.
The sender has compiled a list of Victim Specialists (VS) known to have assisted victims with the case.
The email discusses a plan to contact these VS to request information and ask if they are aware of other VS in their Area of Responsibility (AOR) who also assisted.
